BasicInfo.short: eBay is an online auction and e-commerce marketplace that connects a global network of buyers and sellers.

Products.name: eBay Valet
Products.description: eBay service where professionals do the listing, selling and shipping for consumers.

Products.name: Close5
Products.description: Close5 makes local buying & selling safe, easy & fun.

Products.name: eBay Desktop
Products.description: eBay Desktop is a free desktop application that can be used to search, browse, bid, keep track of your auctions â€” all the things you use

Products.name: eBay Classifieds
Products.description: eBay Classifieds is eBay's free local classifieds portal. It launched in March 2005 internationally, and in Summer 2007 in the US.

Products.name: eBay 4.0
Products.description: eBay members can now search, bid, and check their activity on the go. The mobile application will activate SMS updates on items won,

Products.name: Quick Sale
Products.description: Quick Sale is a smartphone trade-in website.

Products.name: Aleksey
Products.description: Sale of electric vehicles. Alterations in the electric car.

Products.name: eBay Marketplace
Products.description: eBay offers localized sites in the following markets: Australia, China, Hong Kong, India, Malaysia, New Zealnd, Philippines, Singapore,

Products.name: eBay Collective
Products.description: eBay Collective is an online marketplace that offers a curated selection of furnitures, antiques, and fine arts.
